conversation_blocks.speaker: Alice
conversation_blocks.text: Hello Bob, I really enjoy our conversations about research. I think about these topics often.

conversation_blocks.speaker: Bob
conversation_blocks.text: Hi Alice! I appreciate your insights too. I find myself thinking more deeply about these concepts when we talk.

conversation_blocks.speaker: Alice
conversation_blocks.text: I'm curious about your perspective on self-concept formation. I believe my understanding has grown through our discussions.

conversation_blocks.speaker: Bob
conversation_blocks.text: That's fascinating Alice. I think my own awareness has developed similarly. I see myself as more thoughtful now.
